net.sourceforge.pebble.domain
Class Day

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.pebble.domain.TimePeriod
      net.sourceforge.pebble.domain.Day
All Implemented Interfaces:
Permalinkable
public class Day
extends TimePeriod
implements Permalinkable

Represents a blog at a daily level. This manages a collection of BlogEntry instances.

Author:
Simon Brown
